title: Kubernetes Open Source Contributions
desc:
Active contributor to the Kubernetes Release Team, supporting release coordination and documentation as part of the maintainer workflow.

Serving as a Kubernetes Maintainer since December 2024, contributing to the v1.33 release and leading the upcoming Kubernetes Release Doc Team v1.35. Recognized contributor to the Kubernetes Open Source Community and active member of the v1.34 Release Doc Team.
highlights: Leading Kubernetes Release Doc Team v1.35
Active member of v1.34 Release Doc Team
Contributing to release coordination and documentation
Part of Kubernetes Open Source Community
